  • Method Details

    • search

      public Stream<CustomerDetailDto> search(CustomerSearchDto searchParameters)
      Description copied from interface: CustomerService
      Search for customers in the persistent data store matching all provided fields. The firstName, lastName and email are considered a match, if the search string is a substring of the field in customer.
      Specified by:
      search in interface CustomerService
      Parameters:
      searchParameters - the search parameters to use in filtering.
      Returns:
      the customers where the given fields match.

    • update

      public CustomerDetailDto update(CustomerUpdateDto dto) throws NotFoundException, ValidationException, ConflictException
      Description copied from interface: CustomerService
      Updates the customer with the ID given in customer with the data given in customer in the persistent data store.
      Specified by:
      update in interface CustomerService
      Parameters:
      dto - the customer to update
      Returns:
      the updated customer
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the customer with given ID does not exist in the persistent data store
      ValidationException - if the update data given for the customer is in itself incorrect (no name, name too long …)
      ConflictException - if the update data given for the customer is in conflict the data currently in the system (email already exists, …)
